data.text: À Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI maamusɛ, mazɔlɔɔ pagɛ,
À galagiti ta-ƓALAGI maamusɛ,
À maliɠiiti ti-Maliɠii maamusɛ,
Tɔ ɠila kpe ka é maaɓɛlɛ vaa wolaiti kɛɛni,
Tɔ ɠa é geeɠɔlɔgi ɓɛtɛni ga keleɠelegi,
Tɔ ɠa é zooi zuvieni, é pɛɛ ziɛ wolai ɠa,
Tɔ ɠa é wozakala golaiti kpɛtɛai,
É folo ɠaei ɓɛtɛni, é ɗa zei foloi unda,
É alugi ta somideɠaiti kpɛtɛni, ti ɗa zei kpidii unda,
É Ezipete nuiti ti-loun zunu mɔungiti paani,
É Izilayɛle nuiti kulani ti zaama,
ga ná-zeezuɓaai ta zobogi,
Tɔ ɠa é Seeli Kpoloɗɛi ʋalini su fele,
É Izilayɛle nuiti teʋeni saamaʋɛ,
É Falaɠɔn ta ná-kɔɔɓɔgiti tooni bu ná,
É loni ná-nuɓusɛiti tuɠɔ teʋebai zu,
É masa golaiti koloɠoloni,
É masagiti undaaʋilini, zobobɛ nu wolaiti,
É Siɠon undaaʋilini, Amool nuiti ta-masagi,
É Wɔge undaaʋilini, Ɓasan nuiti ta-masagi,
É ta-yooi veeni ga tɔnɔ,
É fe ná-botiɠɛ nui Izilayɛle ʋɛ ga nɔnɔ,
É ɠizɛni ade zu, siɛgi zu ade ɠɛni la maanɔɠɔi zu,
É ade ɠulani de wɔinzeɠe nuiti kpein zea,
Toɠa daamianigi veezu kpɛtɛaniiti pɛ zea,
À GALAGI maamusɛ, nii é geeɠɔlɔgi zu,
